official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to issue a proclamation designating a nationwide celebration and ringing of bells on July 4, 1976.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President to issue a proclamation designating a nationwide simultaneous bellringing on July 4, 1976.

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to issue a proclamation designating a nationwide celebration and ringing of bells on July 4, 1976.
